links.*: The Lord of the Rings: A Reader's Companion
The Lord of the Rings (1978 film)
The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)

wikitext.*:
{{year-header}}
==January==
* '''[[4 January|4]]''' - [[David Collings]], who would voice the part of [[Legolas]] in [[The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)|The Lord of the Rings 1981 radio series]], is born.
* '''[[22 January|22]]''' - [[John Hurt]], who would voice [[Aragorn]] in [[The Lord of the Rings (1978 film)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (1978 film)]], is born.
==March==
* '''[[6 March|6]]''' - [[Hans-Jörg Modlmayr]] is born.
* '''[[7 March|7]]''' - [[Richard O'Callaghan]], who would portray [[Meriadoc Brandybuck]] in [[The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)|The Lord of the Rings 1981 radio series]], is born.
* '''[[30 March|30]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter 38]].
==April==
* '''[[16 April|16]]''' - Artist [[Margrethe II of Denmark]] is born.
==July==
* '''[[12 July|12]]''' - J.R.R. Tolkien writes [[Letter 38a]].
* '''[[16 July|16]]''' - ''[[Beowulf and the Finnsburg Fragment]]'', with contributions from [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], is published.
* '''[[28 July|28]]''' - Actor [[Phil Proctor]] is born.
==August==
* '''[[26 August|26]]-[[27 August|27]]''' - After a hiatus, Tolkien evidently returns to the writing of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'', writing a new outline for the "New Plot".<ref>{{HM|RC}}, p. xxiii</ref>
==September==
* '''[[29 September|29]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 39]].
==October==
* '''[[6 October|6]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 40]].
* '''[[20 October|20]]''' - J.R.R. Tolkien writes [[Letter 40a]].
==December==
* '''[[23 December|23]]''' - [[Father Christmas]] writes a [[Letters from Father Christmas|letter]] to [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s children.
* '''[[24 December|24]]''' - Father Christmas writes a [[Letters from Father Christmas|letter]] to [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s children.
* '''?''' - [[Marjorie J. Burns]], English professor and expert on [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], is born. 
{{Years|1937|1938|1939|1940|1941|1942|1943|}}
{{references}}
